item.description:
Sunday at 10:00am

We will hike @ Copp Park because there is plenty of trails, hills, mud and water!!  Or as Nancy puts it ... "bogginess".  Expensive designer sneakers or high-heels will under-serve your stride on this hike.  After all, it is "Hiking with Dogs", not "Shopping with Dogs"... :-)



This hike will be at Copp Family Park in Groton on Sunday at 10:00am.
This is also known as the Groton Dog Park. We've been there a few times before, and it's a lot of fun!

The hike is about 3.8 miles long. There are fields, steep hills, and cliffs.

 


Directions:

Click the link below to get directions
http://maps.google.com/maps?q=copp+family+park+groton,+CT&hl=en&sll=41.54797,-72.338017&sspn=0.533544,0.905731&ie=UTF8&view=map&f=d&daddr=Groton,+CT+06340&geocode=CWaFS7Hbdcz5FWtRdwId2Mm0-yEh2HDWwHNvmQ&t=h&z=16

 

 

 

Write this down: Fred's Cell/SMS # is 860-227-4027 in case you are late, get lost on the way to or during the hike, etc.
item.how_to_find_us: Fred will be there in his blue Korean go-kart. Beep-Beep!!
item.name: Copp Family Park in Groton, CT
